description: This file defines Flask API route endpoints for TMF resources, acting as a proxy that translates requests and responses between TMF format and native service calls. It sets up class-based views with methods handling various HTTP verbs to perform CRUD operations via proxy services.

classes.name: TMFResourceCollection
classes.description: Flask MethodView for the collection endpoints of TMF resources, supporting GET and POST methods.

classes.name: TMFResourceItem
classes.description: Flask MethodView for individual TMF resource items, supporting GET, PATCH, PUT, DELETE methods.

methods.name: _services()
methods.description: Initializes and returns translator and proxy service instances based on the current app context.

methods.name: get(self, resource: str)
methods.description: Handles GET requests for resource collections, translating TMF queries to native format, forwarding the request, and translating back the response.

methods.name: post(self, resource: str)
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new resource, translating payloads and forwarding to the backend.

methods.name: get (in TMFResourceItem)
methods.description: Retrieves a specific resource item, translating and forwarding the request.

methods.name: patch(self, resource: str, item_id: str)
methods.description: Updates a resource item with PATCH method, translating payloads appropriately.

methods.name: put(self, resource: str, item_id: str)
methods.description: Replaces a resource item with PUT method, with appropriate translation.

methods.name: delete(self, resource: str, item_id: str)
methods.description: Deletes a resource item by forwarding the DELETE request.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("TMF Proxy", "tmf_proxy", url_prefix="\/tmf", description="TMF CRUD proxy endpoi/

ctags.name: delete
ctags.pattern: /^    def delete(self, resource: str, item_id: str):$/

ctags.name: get
ctags.pattern: /^    def get(self, resource: str, item_id: str):$/

ctags.name: patch
ctags.pattern: /^    def patch(self, resource: str, item_id: str):$/

ctags.name: put
ctags.pattern: /^    def put(self, resource: str, item_id: str):$/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("TMF Proxy", "tmf_proxy", url_prefix="\/tmf", description="TMF CRUD proxy endpoi/
